headline: Assurant Acquires OptoFidelity & Boosts Automation Prospects
summary: AIZ acquires OptoFidelity to benefit the Connected Living business of its Global Lifestyle segment.

headline: How To Put $100 In Your Retirement Fund Each Month With Assurant Stock
summary: Assurant Inc. (NYSE:AIZ) is a global protection and insurance company that partners with leading brands to offer risk management and support services for connected devices, homes, and vehicles. It will report its Q3 2025 earnings on Nov. 4. Wall ...
